blogs.plos.org/2010/12/medical-anthropol.snippet: I am happy to publicly announce a new medical anthropology wiki. I started this project last spring, and it really took form this semester with the incredible efforts by my students in my Biocultural Medical Anthropology class. Many thanks to them!
